cu.explanation_en: Changing gNB_ID from "0xe00" to "0xe00x" introduces an invalid character 'x', causing format validation failure and configuration rejection.

du.explanation_en: Setting physCellId to 1008 exceeds the valid range (0-1007), causing cell ID validation failure and preventing proper cell setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 physCellId 設定為 1008 超過有效範圍 (0-1007)，導致小區 ID 驗證失敗，並阻止正確的小區設定。
